Когда играешь в первую часть, после многих-многих часов во вторую, то игра ощущается по-иному. 
[list]
[*]Другие принципы волн зомби, 
[*]Другое поведение танка [добивает инкапнутых и пофиг ему, что в него стреляют, в этот момент, надо же доколотить лежачего], 
[*]Видны ноги и часть тела выживших,
[*]Нет оружия ближнего боя, холодного оружия,
[*]К какой бы игре вы не подключились, в большинстве случаев, будет эксперт.
[/list]
[h1]Второй Лефт - для зеленышей, 
Первый - для крутых парней.[/h1]
Great zombie game if you have friends, boring if you don't. Left 4 Dead 2 improves on everything this game did, get that one instead.

Zaman geçirmek için güzel bir oyun.
Tek başınıza oynayabildiğiniz gibi arkadaşlarınızla da oynayabilirsiniz.

Honestly I quite enjoy this game as well as Left 4 Dead 2. However if you already own Left 4 Dead 2, then there isn't really any point in buying this as the campaigns in this game are availible in Left 4 Dead 2. However this game is just as great as Left 4 Dead 2.

Cons:
-The AI (bots) aren't very helpful in situations where they could help out (mainly during the finales and some of the horde scenarios)
- The AI (bots) only pickup guns, med packs, pain pills and adrenaline shots (so don't expect them to pickup pipe bombs, boomer bile jars, molotovs, gas tanks, petrol cans and defibrillators) [this also relates back to my first one]
-The AI (bots) will open and close normal doors, but they don't close the safe room door (so they'll open the safe room door, but you have to close it)
-The AI (bots) don't get penalized for shooting you, but you get penalized for shooting them (by penalized, i mean you get a warning every time you shoot them and they call out " Stop Shooting me" (well something along those lines). But they can shoot you all they like without you ever telling them off for shooting you)
-The AI will walk in front of you while you're shooting

Pros:
-Different gamemodes to choose from
-Can have custom maps/campaigns
-Likeable characters
-Weapons (sure there's not a lot to really choose from, sure some of them you have to find hidden in the campaign)
-The music and art style/design are amazing (this if game has a soundtrack, would totally listen to it)
-The campaigns are at just the right lenght to make them enjoyable and fun to play through (campaigns can last anywhere between 30 minutes to 1 hour and 30 mins, depending on how many times you have to restart because you died or your team died)
-Each play through is different

Mais que recomendado.

Left 4 Dead é excelente.

A premissa é sobreviver. Mas para isso terá de matar muitos zumbies/infectados e trabalhar em conjunto com seus companheiros.

Jogar com amigos aumenta ainda mais a diversão.

What can I say- this game has aged great and even better when the community is still making content/mods for people to play. I mean this game literally is what got me the friends I have now on discord and steam, I couldn't be more happy for the existence of this

The mother of Left 4 Dead 2. Without melee weapons, this game is all about teamwork with firearms.
While there is less kinds of special infected, less numbers of them drops ingame, making the game pace slower, which is quite good for me.
The special infected bots are also more stealthy in singleplayer campaigns than L4D2.
One more thing, there is no more official valve servers which hosts online lobbies of this, as L4D2 became the majority of Zombie slayin' in Source engine. Only recommended if your friends already got / going to get this game, so that you or your friends can host a local lobby and play together.

I'll tell you, I got it for [b]one[/b] reason. Because I want to see my own goddamn legs! And that's worth all the money in the world!

RU Скажу честно, я играл сначала в неё принуждённо! Был 2015 год, я восстановил стим и вспомнил что купил the orange box, я закачал эту игру из-за того что 2 часть не шла (из-за ошибки с файлами).Я этого не жалею! Первое ощущение что ты реально в центре событий игра: очень сильная атмосфера(я очень испугался когда увидел ведьму), красивая(на 8 год) графика и конечно же ощущение того что тебя прикроют напарники дает уверенности. Если вы хотите купить эту игру, то она это заслуживает.
Плюсы:
+Атмосфера
+Хорошая графика
+Отличные компании
+Возможность загрузки доп. контента
+Неплохие напарники
+Хороший ИИ
+В игра есть Режиссёр(ИИ) он расставляет вещи и зараженных в зависимости от игры, можно перепроходить ходить компании бесконечно.
+Особые заражённые
Минусы: 
-Если вы играете на эксперте, то нубы (обычно они имеют ники пиратов: by Pioneer,I am noob, noob_(И двухзначное число любое), noSTEAM.ro) начинают мешать( френдли фаер, тим килл и т.д.)
-Игра уже старая поэтому в неё уже меньше играют(но всё равно игроков много).
Итого: эта игра заслуживает чтобы её купить(не пиратить!!!)! Уверен, она надолго останется в ваших сердцах( она лучше 2 части).Спасибо за внимание!
EU To be honest, I played it compulsively! Was 2015, I repaired steam and remembered that I bought the orange box, I've downloaded this game due to the fact that part 2 was not (because of an error with the files).I do not regret it! The first impression that you're really in the center of events the game a very strong atmosphere(I was very scared when I saw the witch), beautiful(8 year) graphics and of course the feeling that your back gives teammates confidence. If you want to buy this game, it deserves it.
Pros:
+Atmosphere
+Good graphics
+Great company
+The ability to download additional content
+Good companions
+Good AI
+The game has a Directed(s) he puts belongings and infected, depending on the game, you can replay go to the company indefinitely.
+Special infected
Cons: 
-If you play on expert, then noobs (they usually have nicknames pirate by Pioneer,I am a noob, noob_(And any two-digit number), noSTEAM.ro) get in the way( friendly fire, team kill, etc.)
-The game is old, so it has less play(but still a lot of players).
Total: this game deserves to buy it(not pirate!!!)! I'm sure it will long remain in your hearts( it is better than the 2 parts).Thank you for your attention!

Fight together...or die alone. A new and highly virulent strain of the rabies virus emerges and spreads through the human population with frightening speed. The pandemic's victims become grotesquely disfigured, wildly violent psychopaths, attacking the uninfected on sight. One of the "lucky" few apparently immune to the sickness, you, unfortunately, are also trapped in a city crawling with thousands of the bloodthirsty Infacted. Together with a handful of fellow Survivors, you must fight your way to safety or die alone. A co-operative multiplayer action game from the makers of "Counter-Strike," Left 4 Dead is built atop the most advanced version of the Source Engine and introduces version 2 of Turtle Rock's artificial intelligence (A.I.) technology. [Turtle Rock Studios]

So, Left 4 Dead. What to say about this game? It's already my favourite co-op game. I love the gore and challenge of the  gameplay. I love the community. I made new friends while playing this game. I have a great time. And you will for sure!

Left 4 Dead 2 è un gioco che consiglio fortemente ai retro-videogiocatori, nonostante sia un titolo del 2008, perchè unisce guerra contro zombie con una grafica e un stile di gioco molto antico secondo me. La grafica non è il suo punto forte ma.. il gioco non ha nessun bug e la modalità online giocata con i propri amici è molto divertente.  è la prima volta che lo provo e dopo mezz'oretta di gioco, sono pienamente soddisfatto dell' acuisto, anche se il prezzo è un po' altro(fortunatamente l'ho preso in saldo).

Excelente juego para jugar con amigos, ademas tiene varios modos de juegos que te haran pasar buenas horas jugando.

muy buen juego

Left 4 Dead is in one word, fun. Its my favorite zombie game, but that doesnt mean theres not flaws...... because there are. For example your kills will be stolen very easily when playing online with people, this can become very frustrating. Another flaw is other players can shoot you and it will take health points away, i guess its for realism but its hard to take that seriously when your hanging on a cliff for an hour waiting for someone to revive you. Also storywise theres not too much to offer, grinding through countless maps with little variety can get kind of boring, but every cloud  has a silver lining. One of those silver linings is the exhilarating moments, the ones where your rescue arrives and hundreds of zombies start chasing after you, its a race for your life and if you do its upsetting but can actually be quite funny with you and your group. To sum this up Left 4 Dead can be played by pretty much anyone, its a fun experience especially with friends and i would certainley recommend it. 

7/10

I got this game as well as the second on the Xbox and decided to see how it played on PC. I love it. It is just like playing on a regular console, just without the offline multiplayer option. i don't like how you don't receive achievements when playing in offline mode though. I was gone over 4th of July weekend and was without internet, but I must have unlocked half the achievements, but didn't receive credit because I had to play in offline mode. After I got back and could log on online, it still didn't register so now I have to do all those achievements all over again. I completed the Cr0wnd achievement on the PC version and can't even get that on a console, but I didn't get the achievement because it was done offline. Overall though this game rocks and I definitely recommend it to everyone.
